attributes.additional_details:
Independence for Scotland must be considered by an informed Scottish Electorate .

This must be decided by Scots.
Electorate should be made up of Scots of whom are not only resident in Scotland but can claim ancestry [proving their parents were born in Scotland AND at least one of their grandparents was Scottish].

Also,
SNP figures for Scotland’s Income and Expenditure should be published to enable an informed vote. Not only the figures supporting information.

No one would undertake to buy a Company without reviewing its balance sheet, income and expenditure and shareholders – this must be no different.
